channel.title: Admin Zone
channel.description:
I need an admin zone for my server. I have Deltascape v16 if that helps.. please get me the code or whatever and tell me where to put it in my folders.
Thanks much!
--Zypher

item.dc:creator: @digzey digzey
item.description:
@digzey wrote:

[quote=“the hunt, post:1, topic:289384”][quote author=Zypherx23x link=topic=382470.msg2872955#msg2872955 date=1247873943]
where do i find that? sorry its been a while…
[/quote]

too long if you cant add a command… look in the tutorial section.[/quote]

Well tbh you guys have told him to use methods in which he might not had intergrated into his server i.e : teletomodplace();

You could have told him say telex etc and maybe it would be easier to understand but no… you decided to make it annoying and just refer him somewhere else where he may become frustrated… gj on that :S

item.title: Admin Zone
item.dc:creator: @Zypherx23x Zypherx23x
item.description:
@Zypherx23x wrote:

Thanks guys im going to try this now.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2009, 05:16:11 pm[/size][hr]But where do i put this?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”) && rights >= 1) { //Mods +
teletomodplace();
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”) && rights >= 2) { //Admins +
teletoadminplace();
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“staffzone”) && rights >= 3) { //Owner, Hidden Admin Ect
teletobestplace();
}

I want it at bobs island btw. you got it right.

Read full topic

item.title: Admin Zone
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“rune_sleep, post:6, topic:289319”]Ok Dude this is my Example for Bob’s Island:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone") && rights >= 1){ //Change The 1-3 What Ever u want Like 3-Owner Zone Etc. [/quote]
In that example say you did this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone") && rights >= 1) { //Mods +
teletomodplace();
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone") && rights >= 2) { //Admins +
teletoadminplace();
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone") && rights >= 3) { //Owner, Hidden Admin Ect
teletobestplace();
}

(the teles would be the coords of cource)

what would happen is that no matter if you were a mod, admin, owner, or hidden admin, you would always be teled to the mod place. Why? Because the first statment (>= 1) , says if rights are equal to or greater then (such as admin) it teles you to mod place. To fix, just replace all but the >= 3 with a == (rights == 2 and rights == 1)

Read full topic

@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“rune_sleep, post:6, topic:289319”]Ok Dude this is my Example for Bob’s Island:

} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone") && rights >= 1){ //Change The 1-3 What Ever u want Like 3-Owner Zone Etc. sM("Put Your Message Here!"); triggerTele2(2525, 4776, 0); //Put ur own coords in this is my example }

Hope This Helps Dude :)[/quote]

Get rid of that first bracket.

Read full topic
